example.name: tie-finger
example.description: Demonstration of how to encode fingerd slurs. This example is from Beethoven piano sonata no. 23 in F minor, Op. 57, mvmt. 4: Presto.

file.name: finger.ai
file.description: Adobe Illustrator CS3 file containing example. Equivalent to PDF file.

file.name: finger.mus
file.description: SCORE file used to create example
